TextView.android:text: Thanks for using the A2B application! This application is intended for use by commuters commuting from A to B who want to figure out if their choice of transportation is the right. This can be done by realtime measurement of the trip going from A to B and then by analyzing the time it takes to go from A to B. transportation is stochastic by nature and the transport time may vary according to trip start, day of week, etc. The commuter can try different routes and means of transportation and by this app analyze the impact in time of transportation.
